alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 11:17AM PST until December 31 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any remnant moisture on roadways may freeze overnight with slick and icy roads through New Year`s morning.
info.instruction: Even light snowfall causes major travel delays, especially during periods of high traffic volume. Be sure to allow extra time to reach your destination. Leave extra space between vehicles since it takes longer to stop on slick roadways. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
